meanings.definition: The process of making or becoming a single unit.
meanings.sent1: The unification of the two puzzle pieces created a complete picture.
meanings.sent2: The country celebrated the unification of its divided regions.
meanings.sent3: The unification of the mismatched socks brought joy to the sock drawer.
meanings.sent4: The unification of the ingredients in the recipe resulted in a delicious cake.
meanings.sent5: The unification of the colors in the painting made it truly beautiful.

meanings.definition: The act of bringing together or combining different elements into a unified whole.
meanings.sent1: The unification of the different departments improved efficiency in the company.
meanings.sent2: The unification of various flavors created a unique taste in the dish.
meanings.sent3: The unification of the scattered toys in the room made it look tidy.
meanings.sent4: The unification of voices in the choir created a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: The unification of ideas led to a breakthrough in the project.
